snippet.title: Full Gear: Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Full Gear. Using many goggles, gadgets and guns, you have to engineer your way through a dungeon filled with death machines. Make your own drones, use your Cogwheel tokens, and constantly swap out gear to keep the advantage. Maybe you'll figure out the story along the way.


Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2212500/Full_Gear/
Free downloadable demo: https://dieuwt.itch.io/full-gear-demo

See you around.
